thread.title: Drake Brings Out the Weeknd: Watch
thread.title_full: Drake Brings Out the Weeknd: Watch

author: Pitchfork
title: Drake Brings Out the Weeknd: Watch
text:
Drake Brings Out the Weeknd: Watch Aubrey reconnects with Abel at his tour stop in Oberhausen, Germany Photo by Ollie Millington/WireImage 
In the time since they first collaborated on Take Care , Drake and the Weeknd have both become household names. Their 2016 albums were huge commercial successes. The Canadian pop mega-powers have joined forces once again at Drake’s Boy Meets World tour stop in Oberhausen, Germany. Below, watch them perform “The Hills” from The Weeknd’s 2015 album Beauty Behind the Madness .
